   Leo Berman
   stated on April 27, 2011 in a Texas Tribune article:
   Says the hospital listed on Barack Obama’s just-publicized long-form birth
   certificate denies the president was born there.

Indeed, shortly
   after Obama spoke, state Rep. Leo Berman, R-Tyler, said he’s still not
   persuaded that Obama was born in a Honolulu hospital, according to the
   Texas Tribune.

We searched the Lexis-Nexis database, which archives news articles, and
   the Internet, where skepticism about Obama’s proof of citizenship thrives,
   for assertions that Kapiolani hospital had ever denied that it was the
   site of Obama’s birth.

Obama’s newly-released long-form birth certificate contradicts those
   reports — and Berman’s claim.
